name: Henry Lucas
commend: I had bought a monitor on December 29, 2021 for $499.00. The unit stopped working on February 16, 2022. I sent it to Asus for repair.

name: James Theo
commend: A brand new monitor came with issues and it was not work properly. When I tried to reinstall windows, no drive was found. I did everything I could but I was not able to fix the problem so I sent it back to ASUS to fix the problem, just as I was told by an ASUS representative.

name: Thomas Alfie
commend: On October 18/20 I purchased a $4000 gaming laptop from Newegg - Asus ROG Flow X13 with XG mobile. Within the first week the XG mobile connector became defective and could not be removed from the laptop.

name: Isaac Edward
commend: If you looking for a product that runs only during warranty period go for it. Brought an ASUS premium laptop and after six months the keys came out even with minimal use.

name: Logan Adam
commend: Paid cash for a high end ASUS laptop and it has been the very worse laptop I have ever used. Takes forever to load any program even those not on the internet.

name: Albert Roman
commend: It has been a year that I have purchased this laptop Asus TUF gaming A15 for INR 70K. Honestly being too busy with other work, I have hardly used the laptop.
